c-0: ^And I'm looking for greatness! Seems neither of us can get what they want!!
^No one in this place can challenge me any more. I'm a dance prodigy, and no one on this island can measure up. Not even you, mysterious stranger.

so: ^So... do you have a token or not?

c-0: ^Ha! Ha ha! Do I have a token- tell you what, if you can beat me in a dance battle, I'll give you your token.
^You can try! No one has been able to beat me! Hollis working in the hall says they know some kind of secret dance move, but that it's too powerful. One day I will destroy them.
